title: Nova Watch Collection
summary: Collection of best watch faces available on Play Store
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37-A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: With this collection, you can enjoy three different styles of watch faces each with dozens of custom features. Awesome built-in features include ambient mode of all the styles, weather information, Battery status, Humidity level, visibility, date and many more .Frillroid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and required keen concentration to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:-• Latest Weather updates• Classic Design• Ultimate readability • Clean and simplistic look • Military / police / Aviator Watch Face • Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear LiveVisit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frilldroid.com.How it works?Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Select notification preferences to see the unread messages or emails. Also select the weather background as wallpaper or solid colors.Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
With this collection, you can enjoy three different styles of watch faces each with dozens of custom features. Awesome built-in features include ambient mode of all the styles, weather information, Battery status, Humidity level, visibility, date and many more .
Frillroid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and required keen concentration to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.
Key custom features:-
• Latest Weather updates
• Classic Design
• Ultimate readability
• Clean and simplistic look
• Military / police / Aviator Watch Face
• Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever

This watch face is for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear Live
Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frilldroid.com.
How it works?
Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Select notification preferences to see the unread messages or emails. Also select the weather background as wallpaper or solid colors.
Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
